problem_names: lemma mbhd_insert_invar: "mbhd_invar x l \<Longrightarrow> mbhd_invar x (mbhd_insert x l)"
lemma mbhd_insert_correct: "set (mbhd_insert x l) = insert x (set l)"
lemma mbhd_invar_init: "distinct l \<and> x\<notin>set l \<Longrightarrow> mbhd_invar x l"
lemma mbhd_invar_exit: "mbhd_invar x l \<Longrightarrow> distinct l"
translations: lemma mbhd_insert_invar: "mbhd_invar x l \<Longrightarrow> mbhd_invar x (mbhd_insert x l)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. mbhd_invar x l \<Longrightarrow> mbhd_invar x (mbhd_insert x l)
unfolding mbhd_invar_def mbhd_insert_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. distinct l \<and> x \<notin> set (tl l) \<Longrightarrow>
    distinct (if l = [] then [x] else if x = hd l then l else x # l) \<and>
    x \<notin> set (tl (if l = [] then [x]
                        else if x = hd l then l else x # l))
by (cases l) auto
lemma mbhd_insert_correct: "set (mbhd_insert x l) = insert x (set l)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set (mbhd_insert x l) = insert x (set l)
unfolding mbhd_insert_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set (if l = [] then [x] else if x = hd l then l else x # l) =
    insert x (set l)
by auto
lemma mbhd_invar_init: "distinct l \<and> x\<notin>set l \<Longrightarrow> mbhd_invar x l"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. distinct l \<and> x \<notin> set l \<Longrightarrow> mbhd_invar x l
unfolding mbhd_invar_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. distinct l \<and> x \<notin> set l \<Longrightarrow>
    distinct l \<and> x \<notin> set (tl l)
by (cases l) auto
lemma mbhd_invar_exit: "mbhd_invar x l \<Longrightarrow> distinct l"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. mbhd_invar x l \<Longrightarrow> distinct l
unfolding mbhd_invar_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. distinct l \<and> x \<notin> set (tl l) \<Longrightarrow> distinct l
by (cases l) auto
end
